0.text: Bug 121871  Support intellisense for global varible "report" in both expression builder and script editor.

1.text: Currently expression builder already provide intellisense support for static objects (both BIRT and standard javaScript object).

2.text: However, it doesn't support intellisene for "report".

3.text: Even with the class structure displayed in the expression builder, it is quite difficult to figure out how to use the report varible without intellisense.

4.text: We should use the same mechanism for "report."

5.text: object intellisense support as we did for "this."

6.text: objects:  - UI (expression builder or script editor) get the type for "report" object - UI use reflection to get all properties, methods defined on report object.

7.text: - The reflection process will be recursive.
